name: elasticsearch-index-manager
description: Elasticsearch toolbox to handle a proposed index lifecycle ... smoothly!

scripts.outdated: sh -c 'exit $(yarn outdated --json 2> /dev/null | format-yarn-outdated --excludes=outdated.yml --format csv 2> /dev/null | grep . | grep -v "^yarn run" | grep -v "^\$ " | grep -v "^Done in" | column -s, -t | tee /dev/stderr | grep -v "Version Change" | wc -l)'

author: Placeloop
